meta.content: Corrections; Books; New York and Region
meta.name: online_sections

abstract.p: Correction of August 19 article about Jesse Sheidlower, who heads North American office of Oxford English Dictionary; he was editor, not author, of book The F-Word

block.p: A front-page article on Aug. 19 about Jesse Sheidlower, who heads the North American office of the Oxford English Dictionary, misstated one of his publishing credits. He was the editor of the book ''The F-Word,'' not its author. The article also omitted part of the title of the reference work from which that book was largely derived. It is The Random House Historical Dictionary of American Slang.

A front-page article on Aug. 19 about Jesse Sheidlower, who heads the North American office of the Oxford English Dictionary, misstated one of his publishing credits. He was the editor of the book ''The F-Word,'' not its author. The article also omitted part of the title of the reference work from which that book was largely derived. It is The Random House Historical Dictionary of American Slang.
